titleStmt.title: SII 6.437: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 437. (A.R. No. 2 of 1899). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravarttikaḷ maturaiyum Īḻamuṅ karu
m pāṇṭiyaṉ muṭittalaiyuṅ koṇṭu vijaiyar Abhiṣekamum vira
r Abhiṣekamum paṇṇiyaruḷiṉa śrītiripuvaṉaviratevarkku yāṇṭu 3 10 Ā
vatu kaṟkaṭakanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu ṣaṣṭiyum caṉikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Ire
vatināḷ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Īykkāṭṭukkoṭṭattuk kā
kkaṉūrnāṭṭup pottūr māmpākkiḻāṉ Arayaṉ tillaināyakaṉāṉa ciṅkaḷarāya
ṉṉeṉa Arumoḻitevavaḷanāṭṭuc ceṟṟūrkkūṟṟattu Uṭaiyār tiruk
koḷḷampūtūruṭaiyārkku nāṉ vaitta tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum I
kkoyil tirukkāmakkoṭṭamuṭaiya Aḻakiyanācciyārkku ⌈
vaitta tirunantāviḷakku Oṉṟum Āka viḷakku Iraṇṭukkum na
nāyaṉār devatāṉam tirukkoḷḷampūtūr brahmateyattu nā
ṉ muḷḷāṟṟuṭaiyāṉ pollātāṉpakkal matukkuṭaiyāṉ pañca
netivāṇaṉperil Aṉṉiyanāmattāl vilaikoṇṭu Eṉṉutāy nā
ṉ Aṉubhavittuvarukiṟa nilattuk kiḻppārkkellai Innāyaṉār tiruma
ṭaviḷākattukkut teṟkum kaṭaitteruvukku meṟkum pantalvāyāṟṟu
kkulaikku vaṭakkum malaiyakkuṭaiyāṉ nilattukkuk kiḻakkum naṭuvupaṭṭa
viḷai nilam Iraṇṭumā mukkāṇiyum Iṉṉam Iṅkuviṭṭu muñcivā
ykkālukku meṟkum tirumaṭaviḷākattu vaṭakkiṟt tiruvitikku vaṭakkum
pālaikkuṟicciuṭaiyāṉ nilattukkuk kiḻakkum Uṭciṟuvāykkālukkut teṟku
m naṭuvupaṭṭa maṉai Uṭpaṭa viḷainilaṅkaḷil mukkāṇiyum Āka viḷai nilam
Eṇmāvaraiyiṉāl Iṉnila māṟṟiya pottakappaṭi nilam Oṉpatumāva⌈
raic ciṉṉamum tirunāmattukkāṇiyāyt tirunantāviḷakkuppuṟamāka Innilat
tu Iṟaimikuti śrīpaṇṭārattile mutal vaittukkoṇṭu Ittirunan
tāviḷakku Iraṇṭukkum nāḷ Oṉṟukku Uriy Eḷḷeṇṇaiyāka
vanta Eṇṇai cantirātittavaT śrīpaṇṭārattile viṭṭu Erikkakkaṭa
vatāka nivārttukkuṭutteṉ māmpākkiḻāṉ Arayaṉ tillaināyakaṉāṉa
ciṅkaḷarāyaṉeṉ Ivai Eṉ ṉeḻuttu ....
Digital edition of SII 6.437 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
